name: chrome-extension-codeowners
description: Retrieves the code owners to display in gitlab UI over the patterns

scripts.build: npm run clean && ./build.mjs minify bundle && npm run copy-files
scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && ./build.mjs bundle && npm run copy-files
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run copy-files && ./build.mjs watch

author: ommer ahmad
